snippet: President Obama urged Greece on Thursday to find ways to build its economy even as it continues to cut spending in an effort to recover from a debt-driven economic crisis.
abstract: Pres Obama urges Greece to find ways to build its economy even as it continues to cut spending in effort to recover from debt-driven economic crisis.
lead_paragraph: President Obama urged Greece on Thursday to find ways to build its economy even as it continues to cut spending in an effort to recover from a debt-driven economic crisis.

headline.main: Obama Urges Greece to Grow Economy
headline.print_headline: Obama Urges Greece to Grow Economy
